text: Kandi rwose twohereje Musa azanye ibitangaza byacu (tumubwira tuti) “Kura abantu bawe mu mwijima (w’ubuhakanyi) ubaganishe ku rumuri (rwo kwemera Imana imwe), unabibutse ibihe (by’ingabire) bya Allah. Mu by’ukuri muri ibyo harimo inyigisho kuri buri wese urangwa no kwihangana cyane, akanashimira.”
